articles.title: Euclid: Europe's 'dark explorer' telescope set for launch - BBC
articles.description: The Euclid mission will make an immense 3D map of the cosmos to uncover its biggest secrets.
articles.content:
A European space telescope is about to launch from Florida on a quest to resolve one of the biggest questions in science: what is the Universe made of?
